name: LearnthePresidents
0:
”Alexa, ask Learn the Presidents I want to take the normal test.”
”Alexa, tell Learn the Presidents tell me about a random president.”
”Alexa, ask Learn the Presidents what’s my highscore?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn the presidents
Developer Terms of Use
des: Test your knowledge of the presidents in order by taking the quiz on “Normal” difficulty, or quiz your knowledge about fun presidential facts by taking the quiz on “Hard” mode. Our skill keeps track of your high score so you can see how many presidents you know by heart! You can learn about a random president just for fun, or inquire about the “President of the Day” to gain different knowledge each new day.
